description: Yuta`s mother. A widower who tries her best after the abrupt passing of her late husband. [spoiler="."]In reality she is an abusive woman who seeks out men and doesn`t care how it impacts her son nor does she care much for his well being. Her late husband is the reason why she acts out in a hypersexual way, because of his very sadistic urges he changed her as a person[/spoiler]
name: Kyuoko Tamachi
